name: artism-monorepo
description: Artism 艺术主义生态系统 - 统一管理脚本

scripts.all:install: npm run install:aida-frontend && npm run install:ismism-frontend && npm run install:ismism-backend && npm run install:artism-backend
scripts.all:dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "artism-backend,aida-frontend,ismism-backend,ismism-frontend" "npm run dev:artism-backend" "npm run dev:aida-frontend" "npm run dev:ismism-backend" "npm run dev:ismism-frontend"
scripts.install:aida-frontend: echo "📦 Installing AIDA Frontend dependencies..." && cd apps/aida-frontend && npm install
scripts.install:ismism-frontend: echo "📦 Installing Ismism Frontend dependencies..." && cd apps/ismism-frontend && npm install
scripts.install:ismism-backend: echo "📦 Installing Ismism Backend dependencies..." && cd apps/ismism-backend && npm install
scripts.install:artism-backend: echo "🐍 Installing Artism Backend dependencies..." && cd apps/artism-backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.show:urls:
echo "
🌐 ===== Artism 服务访问地址 =====" && echo "✅ AIDA Frontend:     http://localhost:3100" && echo "✅ AIDA API Docs:     http://localhost:8000/api/docs" && echo "✅ AIDA ReDoc:        http://localhost:8000/api/redoc" && echo "✅ Ismism Frontend:   http://localhost:5273" && echo "✅ Ismism API:        http://localhost:5001/api" && echo "🗄️ MongoDB:           mongodb://localhost:27017" && echo "================================="
scripts.stop: echo "🛑 Stopping all services..." && lsof -ti:3100,5273,8000,5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo "No services to stop"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:aida-frontend && npm run clean:ismism-frontend
scripts.help:
echo "
🚀 Artism 开发命令:" && echo "  npm run all:install    - 安装所有依赖" && echo "  npm run all:dev        - 启动所有服务" && echo "  npm run check          - 快速环境检查" && echo "  npm run check:detailed - 详细环境检查" && echo "  npm run stop           - 停止所有服务" && echo "  npm run clean          - 清理构建缓存" && echo "  npm run show:urls      - 显示访问地址"

author: Artism Team
